us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces

Interface FrameConvexPolygon2DBasics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable, ConvexPolygon2DBasics, ConvexPolygon2DReadOnly, FixedFrameConvexPolygon2DBasics, FrameChangeable, FrameConvexPolygon2DReadOnly, FrameVertex2DSupplier, ReferenceFrameHolder, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable, Vertex2DSupplier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FrameConvexPolygon2D

    public interface FrameConvexPolygon2DBasics
extends FixedFrameConvexPolygon2DBasics, FrameChangeable
    Write and read interface for a convex polygon defined in the XY-plane and that is expressed in in a changeable reference frame, i.e. the reference frame in which this polygon is expressed can be changed.

    This implementation of convex polygon is designed for garbage free operations.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface us.ihmc.euclid.referenceFrame.interfaces.FrameVertex2DSupplier

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        default void clear(ReferenceFrame referenceFrame)
        Clear this polygon and sets it reference frame.

        After calling this method, the polygon has no vertex, area, or centroid.

        Parameters:
        referenceFrame - the new reference frame for this frame convex polygon.
        See Also:
        ConvexPolygon2DBasics.clear()

      • clearAndUpdate

        default void clearAndUpdate(ReferenceFrame referenceFrame)
        Clear this polygon, sets it reference frame.

        After calling this method, the polygon has no vertex, area, or centroid. Use only when an empty polygon is desired.

        Parameters:
        referenceFrame - the new reference frame for this frame convex polygon.
        See Also:
        ConvexPolygon2DBasics.clearAndUpdate()

        void setReferenceFrame(ReferenceFrame referenceFrame)
        Sets the reference frame of this polygon without updating or modifying the coordinates of its vertices.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        referenceFrame - the new reference frame for this frame convex polygon.

      • setIncludingFrame

        default void setIncludingFrame(FrameVertex2DSupplier frameVertex2DSupplier)
        This method does:
        1. setReferenceFrame(ReferenceFrame) using the reference frame of the first vertex.
        2. FixedFrameConvexPolygon2DBasics.set(FrameVertex2DSupplier).

        If the supplier has no vertex, this polygon is cleared and the reference frame is not updated.

        Parameters:
        frameVertex2DSupplier - the supplier of vertices.
        Throws:
        ReferenceFrameMismatchException - if the reference frame of the supplied vertices are inconsistent.
        See Also:
        FrameVertex2DSupplier, FixedFrameConvexPolygon2DBasics.set(FrameVertex2DSupplier)

      • setIncludingFrame

        If the supplier has no vertex, this polygon is cleared and the reference frame is not updated.

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • changeFrameAndProjectToXYPlane

        void changeFrameAndProjectToXYPlane(ReferenceFrame desiredFrame)
        Performs a transformation of the polygon such that it is expressed in a new frame desireFrame.

        Because the transformation between two reference frames is a 3D transformation, the result of transforming this polygon's vertices 2D can result in vertices 3D. This method projects the result of the transformation onto the XY-plane.

        Parameters:
        desiredFrame - the reference frame in which the polygon is to be expressed.
